GSD.description:
NFSv4: Don't hold the layoutget locks across multiple RPC calls

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 08d7a26d115cc7892668baa9750f64bd8baca29b. For more details please see the references link.
